sense.def:
A buckle
je kos kovine ali plastike, pritrjen na en konec pasu ali jermena in namenjen zapenjanju.

To buckle a belt or strap
pomeni zapeti pas ali jermen.

seg.quote: The cuffs of the raincoat are tightly buckled.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
buckles
ali kadar nekaj
buckles something
, se tisti predmet upogne zaradi hude vročine ali sile.

seg.quote: There was an explosion. The door buckled and swung inwards.
The forces within the earth have buckled the strata.

sense.def:
Če človekove noge ali kolena
buckle
, se upognejo, ker so šibka ali utrujena.

seg.quote: His knees almost buckled under him.

sense.def:
To buckle down to something
pomeni resno začeti neko delo.
